<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>15d28c39-5dbf-4fa4-821b-9a12fc4daeca#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A polgári Magyarország születése</string>
            <string language="en">The birth of the civil Hungary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geburt des Zivilungarns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La naissance de la Hongrie civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O nascimento da Hungria civil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La nascita dell'Ungheria civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γέννηση της αστικής Ουγγαρίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El nacimiento de la Hungría civil</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A pesti forradalom, az áprilisi törvények és a nemzetiségi kérdés</string>
            <string language="en">The revolution of Pest, the April Laws and the nationality question</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">polgári magyarország, magyarország</string>
            <string language="en">civil Hungary, Hungary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Umdrehung der Plage, die April Gesetze und die
Nationalität Frage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La révolution du parasite, les lois d'avril et la
question de nationalité</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A volta do pest, as leis de abril e a pergunta da 
nacionalidade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivoluzione del parassita, le leggi di aprile e la
domanda di nazionalità</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επανάσταση του παρασίτου, οι νόμοι Απριλίου και η 
ερώτηση υπηκοότητας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La revolución del parásito, los leyes de abril y
la pregunta de la nacionalidad</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zivilungarn, Ungarn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la Hongrie civile, Hongrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hungria civil, Hungria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'Ungheria civile, Ungheria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστική Ουγγαρία, Ουγγαρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hungría civil, Hungría</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
